Identification_Area.title: The Touch-and-Go Camera Suite (TAGCAMS) aboard the OSIRIS-REx spacecraft

Modification_Detail.description: Updated schema version. Adding missing "investigation" references.

External_Reference.reference_text: B.J. Bos, M.A. Ravine, M. Caplinger, J.A. Schaffner, J.V. Ladewig, R.D. Olds, C.D. Norman, D. Huish, M. Hughes, S.K. Anderson, D.A. Lorenz, A. May, C.D. Jackman, D. Nelson, M. Moreau, D. Kubitschek, K. Getzandanner, K.E. Gordon, A. Eberhardt, and D.S. Lauretta, Touch And Go Camera System (TAGCAMS) for the OSIRIS-REx Asteroid Sample Return Mission, Space Science Reviews, 2018, submitted.

Instrument.name: The Touch-and-Go Camera Suite (TAGCAMS) aboard the OSIRIS-REx spacecraft
Instrument.description: The Touch-and-Go Camera System (TAGCAMS) consists of three cameras: The Navigation Camera, a framing camera used for optical navigation; the Natural Feature Tracking Camera, a framing camera used to aid in sample acquisition; and the Stowage Camera, used to document the storing of the sample into the sample return capsule.
